2110310.name: Cross of Auria - The Zodiac Cache
2110310.description:
Battle Series X: The Zodiac Cache is an add-on to Cross of Auria's Battle Series X DLC! All items included in this goodie pack are intended to help Ruby on her journey through the Zodiac Overwatch!

While Battle Series X does not need to be installed to collect the armor or coins, it does need to be installed to access the merchant who sells the rest of the Zodiac gear.

This content pack includes:

• A resting location inside the Zodiac Overwatch which will grant the party a 10 turn Zodiac Blessing.

• Access to the Zodiac Cache from a teleport pad in the Zodiac Overwatch which contains the following:

- One chest armor piece of each armor type (Cloth, Leather, Mail, Plate).

- One back piece (Cloth / Universal).

- Astral Coins (x20) and Zodiac Coins (x2) to be used at the vendor in the Zodiac Overwatch for your choice of other Zodiac themed gear.

Minimum in-game requirements:

• Ruby must be able to access the Veil at will from anywhere in the world.

• Cross of Auria - Zodiac Overwatch must also be installed to redeem the Astral and Zodiac coins.
